    About Me

    At the moment I'm working as the main Level Designer at Rare Earth Games in Vienna, Austria on an unannounced title published by Coffee Stain Publishing.

    From 2019 to 2021 I worked as a Game Designer at Climax Studios in Portsmouth, UK. Primarily focussing on level design and tech design creating memorable gameplay moments for Mafia Definitive Edition and Returnal.
    On MAFIA: Definitive Edition, I was responsible for creating combat in the Church (Mission 8/9) and the majority of combat for the final mission (Mission 21) in Hangar 13's in-house engine.
    On Returnal I helped the team polish the levels for release and worked with artists to improve collisions of assets to make the traversal feel more smooth and ensure combat is fair.

    I did a four year Game Design course at Breda University of Applied Sciences. During my study there I explored different roles within Game Design and focussed on technical and level design in later years. I worked on several projects ranging from prototypes in small teams to multiple released projects including a Nintendo Switch project.

    My motivation is to create games that bring adventures to their players, games that evoke that natural playfulness (play don't tell) and ultimately makes players smile.
